title: God's Love For You Is Unconditional
itunes:title: God's Love For You Is Unconditional
description:
God doesn’t wait until we're perfect to approve of us. His love is unconditional, which means you can’t work for it; you can only receive it.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
